a1: What is it you like about them?
q2: I like their fan culture and the Jerseys.
a2: They are loud and very good fans. The closest European fans to a traditional English support.
q3: one of the best hobbies of today
a3: Your favorite part of the soccer team is seriously the fans?
q4: Borussia Dortmund receives love from the hobby
a4: Does BVB Dortmund need a larger stadium to fit all their fans in?
q5: Only if they all turn up at once!
a5: That would be great if they did, wouldn't it?
